articles.title: All about this week’s Pacific super blood moon lunar eclipse - South China Morning Post
articles.description: With the moon at its closest point to Earth, and a full moon, Hong Kong will witness a total lunar eclipse on Wednesday. The spectacular sight will also be visible from East Asia to the US west coast if skies are clear.
